description:
Ddraig is the Red Dragon sleeping within Issei. Ddraig is, in fact, one of the two Heavenly Dragons known as the Welsh Dragon and the Red Dragon Emperor that has the power the destroy both God and Satan. In the past, Ddraig fought against his arch-rival, the Vanishing Dragon, Albion, which was interfered with by the Angels and Devils. In anger, both Dragons attacked both sides, which led to their bodies being destroyed and their souls moved to two separate Sacred Gears, with Ddraig moved to the Red Dragon Emperor`s Gauntlet. Ddraig has telepathically communicated with Issei on various occasion, giving him advice on his fight, and calls Issei his "Partner".
Source: Wikipedia
